entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:28 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
